duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage construction projects in the educational and healthcare sectors, ensuring compliance with regulations and quality standards.
Lead and manage a team of construction specialists, providing guidance and direction to achieve project objectives.
Ensure adherence to OSHA guidelines, building codes, and construction procedures to maintain a safe and efficient work environment.
Facilitate communication and negotiation with stakeholders, subcontractors, and vendors to resolve issues and achieve project success.
Utilize construction management software to effectively plan, organize, and oversee project activities.
Make informed decisions under pressure, solve problems effectively, and drive the successful completion of construction projects.

education_certification.credential: Degree in construction management, engineering, or related field (Certifications and licenses required)
